metadata.feature_description: Integrates Bootstrap responsive grid system for column layouts.

steps.action: Navigate to home page and enter edit mode to view Content Layout
steps.expected: Page loads with Content Layout module visible
steps.actual: Page loaded successfully with Content Layout panes visible (F30A_Pane1, F30A_Pane2, 9977_Pane1-4)

steps.action: Execute JavaScript to check if bootstrap.min.css is loaded
steps.expected: Bootstrap CSS stylesheet should be loaded on the page

steps.action: Execute JavaScript to inspect column elements for Bootstrap classes
steps.expected: Column elements should have Bootstrap grid classes (col-lg-*, col-md-*, col-sm-*, col-xs-*)
steps.actual: Found 6 column elements with Bootstrap classes: F30A_Pane1 (col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12), F30A_Pane2 (col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12), 9977_Pane1-4 (col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-3 col-xs-12)

steps.expected: Columns should display at correct widths based on Bootstrap classes
steps.actual: 2-column layout shows F30A_Pane1 and F30A_Pane2 at 50% width each. 4-column layout shows 9977_Pane1-4 at 25% width each

steps.action: Resize viewport to 992px (md breakpoint) and verify layout
steps.expected: Columns should maintain their grid layout at medium breakpoint
steps.actual: At 992px, columns maintained multi-column layout with col-md-* classes applying (6-column and 3-column widths)

steps.action: Verify Bootstrap breakpoints: lg (>=1200px), md (992-1199px), sm (768-991px), xs (<768px)
steps.expected: Layout should adapt based on viewport width
steps.actual: Bootstrap CSS contains responsive breakpoints at @media (min-width:768px), (min-width:992px), (min-width:1200px)

steps.action: Resize viewport to 480px (xs/mobile breakpoint) in view mode
steps.actual: At 480px, columns stacked vertically - TELEVISIONS and WEARABLES displayed full-width and stacked

steps.expected: Desktop shows multi-column layout, mobile shows single-column stacked layout
steps.actual: Desktop (1280px) showed 4-column layout with items side-by-side. Mobile (480px) showed single-column stacked layout

steps.action: Verify respond.min.js file exists in ContentLayout module
steps.expected: respond.min.js file should exist for IE8 media query polyfill
steps.actual: Found respond.min.js (Respond.js v1.4.2 by Scott Jehl) at Evoq Content/Modules/ContentLayout/ClientScripts/respond.min.js

steps.action: Verify respond.js injection code exists in View.ascx.cs
steps.expected: Code should inject respond.js via IE8 conditional comments
steps.actual: InjectRespondJsForIE8() method found at View.ascx.cs:172-184 - injects respond.js via IE8 conditional comments: <!--[if IE 8]><script src='{0}ClientScripts/respond.min.js'></script><![endif]-->

steps.action: Check page HTML for respond.js reference and IE conditional comments
steps.expected: Page should contain respond.js reference in HTML
steps.actual: JavaScript evaluation confirmed: hasRespondJsReference=true, hasIEConditionalComments=true. Script not loaded in modern browser as expected (conditional comments only apply to IE)

observations: Bootstrap CSS is customized/scoped under .dnn-cl class to avoid conflicts with site theme styles
Bootstrap v3.2.0 grid system is used with 12-column responsive grid
ColumnSizesHelper.cs generates Bootstrap CSS classes based on column size configuration (e.g., '50' generates 'col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12')
All columns use col-xs-12 for mobile, ensuring full-width stacking on small devices
IE8 compatibility is implemented via conditional comments - respond.js only loads in IE8, cannot be tested via UI in modern browsers
